trans-unit.source: The class creates a default CCMapping between an EntityContainer in S space and an EntityContainer in C space.
trans-unit.target: 类 C 空间中创建默认 CCMapping S 空间中的 EntityContainer 和 EntityContainer 之间。

trans-unit.source: The Mapping will be created based on the declared types of extents.
trans-unit.target: 创建映射，将基于声明的扩展盘区类型。

trans-unit.source: So Inheritance does not work.
trans-unit.target: 因此继承不起作用。

trans-unit.source: No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
trans-unit.target: 将不更新此处的任何内容;请不要在这里添加材料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The storage model EntityContainer from which conceptual and mapping metadata is created.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建概念和映射元数据存储模型的 EntityContainer。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The storage model EntityContainer from which conceptual and mapping metadata is created.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建概念和映射元数据存储模型的 EntityContainer。

trans-unit.source: The name for the conceptual model namespace.
trans-unit.target: 概念模型命名空间的名称。

trans-unit.source: If this value is null, the storeEntityContainer name is used for the namespace name.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为 null，则 storeEntityContainer 名称用于命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: The EntityContainer name declared in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 概念模型中声明的 EntityContainer 名称。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EntityModelGenerator
trans-unit.target: 构造 EntityModelGenerator

trans-unit.source: The StoreItemCollection that contains an EntityContainer and other items to create the Model Metadata from.
trans-unit.target: 包含要创建从模型元数据的 EntityContainer 和其他项 StoreItemCollection。

trans-unit.source: The name to give the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 要为命名空间的名称。

trans-unit.source: If null, the name of the storeEntityContainer will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 null，则将使用 storeEntityContainer 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name to give the Model EntityContainer.
trans-unit.target: 要为模型 EntityContainer 名称。

trans-unit.source: If null, a modified version of the namespace of the of a type referenced in storeEntityContainer will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 null，修改后的版本的命名空间将使用在 storeEntityContainer 中引用的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the EdmItemCollection that was created by the GenerateMetadata method.
trans-unit.target: 获取已由 GenerateMetadata 方法创建 EdmItemCollection。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> object that contains the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"> </xref>包含概念架构定义语言 (CSDL) 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the conceptual model EntityContainer that was created by the GenerateMetadata method.
trans-unit.target: 获取概念模型由 GenerateMetadata 方法的 EntityContainer。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object that contains the conceptual model EntityContainer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>对象，其中包含概念模型的 EntityContainer。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag for generating foreign key properties in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于生成在概念模型中的外键属性的标志。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> then foreign key properties are generated in the conceptual model; otherwise foreign key properties are not generated in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>然后中概念模型中生成的外键属性; 否则外键属性不生成在概念模型中。

trans-unit.source: Generates the conceptual model metadata information and returns any schema errors.
trans-unit.target: 生成概念模型元数据信息，并返回的任何架构错误。

trans-unit.source: A collection of schema error objects.
trans-unit.target: 架构错误对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Generates the conceptual model metadata information and returns any schema errors.
trans-unit.target: 生成概念模型元数据信息，并返回的任何架构错误。

trans-unit.source: The property of EntityFrameworkVersions that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: 对应于实体框架的目标版本的 EntityFrameworkVersions 的属性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of schema error objects.
trans-unit.target: 架构错误对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the PluralizationService value that indicates the service used when generating a model.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 PluralizationService 值，该值指示生成模型时所使用的服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> value that indicates the service used when generating a model.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref>值，该值指示生成模型时所使用的服务。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 生成的概念性架构定义语言 (CSDL) 写入指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to an XmlWriter object.
trans-unit.target: 写入的 XmlWriter 对象生成的概念性架构定义语言 (CSDL)。

trans-unit.source: The XmlWriter to which the CSDL is written.
trans-unit.target: 要向其写入 CSDL XmlWriter。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated mapping specification language (MSL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 将写入指定的文件的生成的映射规范语言 (MSL)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated mapping specification language (MSL) to an XmlWriter object.
trans-unit.target: 写入的 XmlWriter 对象生成的映射规范语言 (MSL)。

trans-unit.source: The XmlWriter to which the MSL is written.
trans-unit.target: 要向其写入 MSL XmlWriter。
